---
order: 1
title:
  zh-CN: 容错处理
  en-US: Fault tolerant
---

## zh-CN

显示加载失败信息。

## en-US

Display loading failure info.

```jsx
import { Image } from 'antd';

function ImageDemo() {
  return (
    <Image
      width={200}
      src="error"
      fallback="data:image/png;base64,"
    />
  );
}

ReactDOM.render(<ImageDemo />, mountNode);
```
